b'Da Shi Jie': b'A hard rain is about to fall on a small town in Southern China. In a desperate attempt to find money to save his fianc\xc3\xa9e\xe2\x80\x99s failed plastic surgery, Xiao Zhang, a mere driver, steals a bag containing 1 million from his boss.
